text.autoconfig.hexcessible.title: Hexcessible Config
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.dimme: Dim the background of the spellcasting interface
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.hideF: Hide the patterns shown around the player when casting spells
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.showA: Show all dots in the spellcasting interface, instead of just the ones close to your cursor
text.autoconfig.hexcessible.option.inspe: Show details about the pattern you're drawing if you hold still
